title: Anyone want to upgrade an Evers Bat Cubs SGC 40 to a 50?
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Anyone want to upgrade an Evers Bat Cubs SGC 40 to a 50?
posts.post_content: This just came back from SGC.  I don't have the 40 in this pose, so if someone with a 40 wants to upgrade to this 50, let me know and we can work out the details.   Otherwise, it's heading to consignment.
